title: React Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of React.js including components, state, and props.
author: John Doe
learningOutcomes:
- Understand JSX
- Create functional components
- Manage state and props

title: Advanced React
description: Dive deeper into React hooks, context API, and performance optimization.
author: Jane Smith
learningOutcomes:
- Use useEffect, useMemo, useReducer
- Implement Context API
- Optimize React apps

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript including functions, arrays, and objects.
author: Alice Brown
learningOutcomes:
- Variables and data types
- Functions and scope
- Array and object manipulation

title: Node.js & Express
description: Learn backend development using Node.js and Express framework.
author: Bob Martin
learningOutcomes:
- Setup Node server
- Create REST APIs
- Handle middleware and routes

title: MongoDB for Beginners
description: Understand NoSQL databases and work with MongoDB CRUD operations.
author: Charlie Davis
learningOutcomes:
- Setup MongoDB
- Create, Read, Update, Delete documents
- Understand collections

title: Fullstack Project
description: Build a fullstack application using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
author: Dana Lee
learningOutcomes:
- Connect frontend to backend
- Perform CRUD operations
- Deploy fullstack app
